dotgeminidev/.gemini

AI-powered commands for Gemini CLI to automate your workflow

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Gemini CLI: command-line tool for running Gemini AI models and code tasks in your terminal
  • Chat UI for Gemini CLI, turn commands into conversations
  • GUI for Gemini CLI and other LLMs
  • Agentic developer experience for Gemini CLI
  • Vercel AI SDK provider for Google Gemini models via CLI
  • AI teammate for GitHub repos, automates PR reviews and issue triage
  • build modular AI pipelines with async processing and Gemini API integration
  • Integrates Gemini into Apple Shortcuts via Cloudflare Workers
  • Deploys AI Studio apps locally with Gemini API
  • Backend framework for building APIs, automations, and AI workflows with code and events
